mapper.select: SELECT m.movieCode, movieNm, audits, thumbNail,movieScores FROM movie m LEFT OUTER JOIN (select movieCode, NVL(AVG(movieScores)*2,0) movieScores from movieScore group by movieCode) s on m.movieCode= s.movieCode WHERE endDate > SYSDATE OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
select NVL(count(*),0) countUserId from moviereply where moviecode =#{movieCode}

SELECT r.movieCode, r.userId, r.content, TO_CHAR(r.created, 'YY.MM.DD') created, s.movieScores FROM moviereply r JOIN member m on m.userId = r.userId JOIN movie e on e.movieCode = r.movieCode JOIN movieScore s on s.movieCode = e.movieCode WHERE r.movieCode=#{movieCode} ORDER BY r.created DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

INSERT ALL INTO movieReply(movieCode, userId, content, created) values(#{movieCode}, #{userId}, #{content}, sysdate) INTO movieScore(movieCode, userId, movieScores) values(#{movieCode}, #{userId}, #{movieScores}) select * from dual
mapper.delete: delete FROM movieReply where movieCode=#{movieCode} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: update movieReply set content = #{content} where movieCode=#{movieCode}
